none: Cexcrime - Rip It If It's Specific
Cexcrime - Rip It If It's Specific

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on October 30, 2021 Description from Terminal Escape:
The folks at Deluxe Bias made some serious waves when they popped up a couple of years ago. Short, feisty bursts of raw hardcore seemed to filled the magnetic space on each one of their tapes and it was all a fucking mystery. Wyoming? The fuck? The releases have gotten dirtier, a little more GAG and a little more rock 'n roll (check the MOTOR CORP banger - total mindfuck), but this is DB#3, motherfukkrs. Loud, fast, snotty, raw USHC. Let's GO!Â RIP IT IF ITS SPECIFIC
